entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • C# Docker container System.Net.Http.HttpRequestException: Resource temporarily unavailable (<URL>:4003) #54162
  • "Angular and ASP.NET CORE" default template gives 404 once deployed in IIS #54161
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_dapper #54160
  • Blazor .NET 8 [RenderModeInteractiveAuto] getting an error #54159
  • .NET 8 Blazor - StreamRendering - Magic Pill or Major Headache? #54157
  • Blazor WASM: change way querystring parameters are generated for arrays #54154
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef, single_query #54148

Closed

  • Perf improvement: plaintext #54149
  • Blazor: NavigationManager - NavigateTo bug with parameters #52138
    8.0.3
  • Blazor Convention Authorization when pages folder in different assembly #54145
  • OnAfterRender not called on interactive component in loop #54153
  • Request not being aborted after closing the connection is causing high CPU #52564
  • .NET 9 Preview 1 SupplyParameterFromQuery Only Triggers OnParametersSet Once for Repeated Navigations with Same Query String #54091
  • Blazor Web Assembly + Hybrid: HttpClient Upload Progress with ProgressableStreamContent #54105
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #54097
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_ef, updates #54124
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, plainTextSansFilter #54140
  • Perf regression: caching #54141
  • Improve server addresses collection debugging #54030
  • Add new enum for Downloads directory to System.Environment.SpecialFolder enum #54146
  • [Blazor] NPE in ExternalLogin.razor in the Blazor Web App with auth template #53221
    9.0-preview2

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't pass nameof to ObjectDisposedException.ThrowIf #54164
  • Add AddHubOptions extension on IServiceCollection #54163
    community-contribution
  • fixed DefaultProblemDetailsWriter Doesn't Handle Media Type Subsets #52577 #54158
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Manually resolve ref and runtime packs instead of modifying the .NET SDK used in the build #54147
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Improved Server Addresses Collection Debugging #54120
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview2

Updated

  • Populate the ValidIssuer and the ValidAudience properties of the JwtBearerOptions.TokenValidationParameters. #52821
    area-auth, community-contribution
  • Added a null check in ResolveHasInvalidAntiforgeryValidationFeature() #53208
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Add missing TimeProvider registration #53946
    area-identity, community-contribution, 9.0-preview2
  • [release/8.0] Disable buffering of Blazor streaming responses #53930
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Disable buffering of Blazor streaming responses #53929
    area-blazor
  • Enable unified build #54084
    area-infrastructure
